## Lists

```{r}
vec_numeric = 1:4
vec_char = c("a", "b", "c", "d")

tibble(
  num = vec_numeric,
  char = vec_char
)
```

```{r}
l = 
  list(
    vec_numeric = 1:5,
    vec_char = LETTERS,
    matrix = matrix(1:10, nrow = 5, ncol = 2),
    summary = summary(rnorm(100))
  )

l[[1]]
l["summary"]
```

### Loops:

```{r}
mean_and_sd = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("Argument x should be numeric")
  } else if (length(x) == 1) {
    stop("Cannot be computed for length 1 vectors")
  }
  
  mean_x = mean(x)
  sd_x = sd(x)

  tibble(
    mean = mean_x, 
    sd = sd_x
  )
}

list_norms = 
  list(
    a = rnorm(20, 3, 1),
    b = rnorm(20, 0, 5),
    c = rnorm(20, 10, .2),
    d = rnorm(20, -3, 1)
  )

output = vector("list", length = 4)

for (i in 1:4) {
  output[[i]] = mean_and_sd(list_norms[[i]])
}

output
```
